==Features==
==Features==
â
*'''Multimedia support''': ''Super Ubuntu'' is prepackaged with support for MP3 files and [[DVD-Video|video-DVDs]] by default, it also includes additional codecs, and additional media players ([[VLC media player]] and [[MPlayer]])
+
*'''Multimedia support''': ''Super Ubuntu'' is prepackaged with support for MP3 files and [[DVD-Video|video-DVDs]] by default, it also includes additional codecs, and [[VLC media player]]
â
*'''Support for Microsoft Office 2007 file formats''' with [[OpenOffice.org]] 3.0
+
*'''Support for Microsoft Office 2007 file formats''' with [[OpenOffice.org]] 3.0.1
â
*'''Improved Internet experience''': It includes an additional web browser ([[Opera (web browser)|Opera]]), [[Adobe Flash Player]], more communication software ([[aMSN]], [[Skype]] and [[Mozilla Thunderbird]]) and P2P software ([[aMule]])
+
*'''Improved Internet experience''': It includes an additional web browser ([[Opera (web browser)|Opera]]), [[Adobe Flash Player]], more communication software ([[aMSN]] and [[Skype]]
â
*'''Additional software''': It also includes [[Adobe Reader]], [[GParted]], [[Wine (software)|Wine]], the [[GUI for Uncomplicated Firewall]], and other software.
+
*'''Additional software''': It also includes, [[GParted]], [[Wine (software)|Wine]], the [[GUI for Uncomplicated Firewall]], and other software.
==Live USB==
==Live USB==
â
The developer of ''Super Ubuntu'' also created a Windows tool called [http://hacktolive.org/cd2usb cd2usb] to create Ubuntu and Super Ubuntu [[Live USB]]s. The program is expected to be included in the next release of Super Ubuntu.<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/RoadMap_for_Super_Ubuntu Super Ubuntu RoadMap]</ref>
+
There is also a Windows tool called [http://hacktolive.org/cd2usb cd2usb] to create Ubuntu and Super Ubuntu [[Live USB]]s. The program is already included in the DVD of Super OS<ref>http://hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/</ref>.
==Ubuntu extras remix==
==Ubuntu extras remix==
â
The developer of ''Super Ubuntu'' has decided to create a lighter version, called "[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Ubuntu_extras_remix Ubuntu extras remix]", a version of Ubuntu that only includes updates and ubuntu_restricted_extras <ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Ubuntu_extras_remix Ubuntu extras remix (official website)]</ref>
+
The developer of ''Super Ubuntu'' has decided to create a lighter version, called "[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Ubuntu_extras_remix Ubuntu extras remix]", a version of Ubuntu that only includes updates and ubuntu_restricted_extras <ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Ubuntu_extras_remix Ubuntu extras remix]</ref>
